message:
SYSTEM: ATHENS_Terminology_in_ontologies_15-11-2010.pdf: Página 3
3
What is terminology?
The term terminology is polysemic:
• As  a product: set of terms from a given subject field. 
• As a discipline: set of fundamental principles and 
conceptual bases that govern the study of specialized 
terms, their description, analysis and relations. 
• As a practice: set of principles oriented towards 
term compilation
speaker: SYSTEM
